name: harira
ingredients: 4 tablespoons of chopped parsley and coriander
1 tablespoon of clarified or regular butter
steps: Chop the onion, celery, parsley, and coriander.
Sauté the meat and onion in olive oil.
Add the spices (salt, pepper, ginger, turmeric).
Add the chickpeas, lentils, tomato paste, bouillon cube, and water. Let it simmer.
Prepare the 'tédouira' (thickener) by mixing the flour with a bit of water.
Pour the tédouira into the soup while stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
Add the vermicelli and cook until the soup thickens and the ingredients are cooked.
Add the clarified butter (smen) at the end of cooking and serve hot.
